properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 5 at 9:24AM CST until January 9 at 4:48AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Paradise

.Minor flooding continues on the Green River at Paradise. The river
is cresting this Sunday morning, near 383.7 feet. It is expected to
then begin a slow fall, and is forecast to fall below flood stage
Wednesday evening.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Paradise.
* until late Wednesday night.
* At  8:15 AM Sunday the stage was 383.7 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is cresting near 383.7 feet today, and
will then begin a slow fall. The river will fall below flood
stage Wednesday before midnight.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
